job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Solutions Engineer

At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Solutions Engineer role, emphasizing client relationships, technical demonstrations, and advising on data architecture. While it mentions 'data science and analytics' and 'Spark programming', it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying AI/ML models, fine-tuning generative models, or core MLOps practices. The role appears to be more focused on pre-sales technical consultation and solution design using existing platforms rather than core AI/ML engineering or GenAI development.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires forming successful relationships with clients, providing technical and business value, and guiding businesses forward, indicating a need to understand client business challenges and align solutions.
The role aims to help customers solve complex data challenges and achieve their goals, which requires understanding their business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: help customers solve their complex data challenges

job_tasks.justification: The role involves guiding customers' businesses forward, implying a need to understand business objectives.
The role involves advising on 'Big Data Analytics' architecture and design, which often includes aspects of data infrastructure and pipelines.
job_tasks.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Spark programming' which is a technology used for data processing and can be applied to model training, although the focus is on demonstration rather than core model development.
The role involves authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications, which requires developing technical content and examples.
job_tasks.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications

job_tasks.justification: The role requires integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications, which involves understanding and demonstrating software integration.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the role involves demonstrating a platform that makes data science and analytics accessible and helps turn insights into action, implying an understanding of how solutions are operationalized for customers.
job_tasks.phrase: makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone

soft_skills.phrase: collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect
Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
